press_lever.description: Press the toilet lever to initiate a flush.

clean_lever.description: Clean the toilet lever from dust or any other particles.

close_lid.description: Close the toilet lid by lowering it to the closed position.

clean_opened_lid.description: Clean the opened toilet lid to ensure hygiene.

open_lid.description: Open the toilet lid by lifting it to the opened position.

clean_closed_lid.description: Clean the closed toilet lid to maintain hygiene.

close_seat.description: Close the toilet seat by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_opened_seat.description: Clean the opened toilet seat for hygiene purposes.

open_seat.description: Open the toilet seat by swinging it on its hinge to the opened position.

clean_closed_seat.description: Clean the closed toilet seat to ensure cleanliness.

clean_toilet_body.description: Clean the toilet body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_toilet.description: Clean the entire toilet including the toilet body, lid, seat, and lever.
